CustomField.description: The ID of the Google Drive folder where files will be uploaded by default. If this field is not specified, files may be uploaded to My Drive, which is considered a bad practice. Therefore, this field is required.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ID of the Google Drive folder where files will be uploaded by default. If this field is not specified, files may be uploaded to My Drive, which is considered a bad practice. Therefore, this field is required.
CustomField.label: Default Google Upload Folder Id
